bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
var a = 0;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (java.ajax(Get('url')).includes(Account)) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏时间', `{{Get('url')}}/user/${cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))}/favorite/albums?o=mr`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏更新', `{{Get('url')}}/user/${cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))}/favorite/albums?o=mp`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('最近阅读', `{{Get('url')}}/user/${cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))}/favorite/watchlist`, 1, 0.25, false));
        a = 4;
    }
}
Shunt = `{{get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)}}`;
T = `{{get('t',Get('o'))}}`;
if(Get('t') > 0) {
    Area = `{{get('area',Get('u'))}}`;
    Type = `{{get('type',Get('v'))}}`;
    title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
    var Url = Get('url') + '/theme/';
    var html = java.ajax(Url);
    if(html.includes('no-js')){
        cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
        html = java.startBrowserAwait(Url,"验证").body();
    }
    var Kind = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('.btn-toolbar');
    var kind0 = Kind[0] ? Kind[0].select('li') : [];
    title = '✣  热门主题  ✣';
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
    for (i in kind0) {
        kind = kind0[i].select('a').text()
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/search/photos${Area}${Shunt}&search_query=${kind}${Type}${T}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind, url, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
    BID = (kind0.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind0.length % 3));
    for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
       exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
    }
    var kind3 = Kind[3] ? Kind[3].select('li') : [];
    title = '✣  主题A漫  ✣';
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
    for (i in kind3) {
        kind = kind3[i].select('a').text()
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/search/photos${Area}${Shunt}&search_query=${kind}${Type}${T}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind, url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    BID = (kind3.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind3.length % 4));
    for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
       exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
    }
    var kind4 = Kind[4] ? Kind[4].select('li') : [];
    title = '✣  角色 / 扮演  ✣';
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
    for (i in kind4) {
        kind = kind4[i].select('a').text()
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/search/photos${Area}${Shunt}&search_query=${kind}${Type}${T}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind, url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    BID = (kind4.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind4.length % 4));
    for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
       exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
    }
    var kind5 = Kind[5] ? Kind[5].select('li') : [];
    title = '✣  特殊PLAY  ✣';
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
    for (i in kind5) {
        kind = kind5[i].select('a').text()
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/search/photos${Area}${Shunt}&search_query=${kind}${Type}${T}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind, url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    BID = (kind5.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind5.length % 4));
    for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
       exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
    }
    var kind6 = Kind[6] ? Kind[6].select('li') : [];
    title = '✣  其他  ✣';
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
    for (i in kind6) {
        kind = kind6[i].select('a').text()
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/search/photos${Area}${Shunt}&search_query=${kind}${Type}${T}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind, url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    BID = (kind6.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind6.length % 4));
    for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
       exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
    }
} else {
    title = [
        '爱心排行','评论排行','评分排行','订阅数量','图片数量','最近更新',
        '爱心排行','评论排行','评分排行','订阅数量','图片数量','最近更新',
        '爱心排行','评论排行','评分排行','订阅数量','图片数量','最近更新',

        '爱心排行','评论排行','评分排行','订阅数量','图片数量','最近更新'
    ];
    name = [
        '/albums/hanman',
        '/albums/hanman',
        '/albums/hanman',
        '/albums/hanman',
        '/albums/hanman',
        '/albums/hanman',
        '/albums/doujin/sub/japanese',

        '/albums/another/sub/other'
    ];
    type = [
        '&o=tf','&o=md','&o=tr','&o=mv','&o=mp','&o=mr',
        '&o=tf','&o=md','&o=tr','&o=mv','&o=mp','&o=mr',
        '&o=tf','&o=md','&o=tr','&o=mv','&o=mp','&o=mr',
        '&o=tf','&o=md','&o=tr','&o=mv','&o=mp','&o=mr',
        '&o=tf','&o=md','&o=tr','&o=mv','&o=mp','&o=mr',
        '&o=tf','&o=md','&o=tr','&o=mv','&o=mp','&o=mr',
        '&o=tf','&o=md','&o=tr','&o=mv','&o=mp','&o=mr',
        '&o=tf','&o=md','&o=tr','&o=mv','&o=mp','&o=mr',
        '&o=tf','&o=md','&o=tr','&o=mv','&o=mp','&o=mr',
        '&o=tf','&o=md','&o=tr','&o=mv','&o=mp','&o=mr'
    ];
    for (i in title) {
        url = `{{Get('url')}}${name[i]}${Shunt}${type[i]}${T}&page={{page}}`;
        exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
    exploreUrl.splice(0+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨韩漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(7+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨日语✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(14+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨汉化✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(21+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨C  G✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(28+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨短篇✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(35+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨单本✨ 　　   ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(42+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨3  D✨　　    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(49+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨COS✨　　    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(56+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨美漫✨　　    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(63+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨其他✨　　    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
eval(String(source.loginUrl)); var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var list = java.getElements('.btn-toolbar a'); var list1 = java.getElements('.nav-tab-content.col-lg-7.col-xs-12 .tag-block'); var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var $2 = element => String(java.getElements(element).text()); var $3 = element => String(J.select(element).attr('src')); url = baseUrl; s = '✦ ' + $2('.list-style-none.d-inline-block span.1') + ',' + '♥ ' + $2('.list-style-none.d-inline-block span.0'); k = $2('.nav-tab-content.col-lg-7.col-xs-12 .tag-block.2').replace(/.*?：/, '').replace(/\s/g, ','); t = $2('.float-right.p-t-5').replace(/.* /, ''); l = list[0] ? String(list[list.length - 1].text()).replace(/\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}/, '') : $2('.reading.dropdown-toggle.btn-primary.btn.col'); l = String(l); l = Get('settle') == true ? l.replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, l.match(/\d+/) ? l.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : l; Setting = '\n📌当前源站：' + (Get('ci0') == 0 ? '〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n🧭当前线路：〖' + (Get('p') == 2 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗线路[' + Get('p') + ']') + ('\n🎰发现类型：〖' + (Get('t') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + T[Get('t')]) + ('\n📕标签分类：〖' + (Get('u') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + U[Get('u')]) + ('\n📚标签排序：〖' + (Get('v') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + V[Get('v')]) + ('\n📆日期分类：〖' + (Get('o') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + y[Get('o')]) + ('\n📰评论页数：〖' + (Get('f') == 5 ? var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
    if(String(Account).length > 0 && baseUrl.includes('/login')) {
        Login();
        let url = String(Get('url') + '/user/' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) + '/favorite/albums');
        java.setContent(java.get(url,Headers).body());
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/user/')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-6.col-sm-3.col-md-3.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.video-title.title-truncate');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/watchlist')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-3.col-sm-2.col-md-2.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.image-item-text');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    var list = java.getElements('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = $('.m-t-5.title-truncate.video-title');
        var authors = [];
        var titleTruncateElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in titleTruncateElements) {
            if (!titleTruncateElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                authors.push(String(titleTruncateElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/(&| & | \|,|\s)/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/');
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            if (kindElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        kind = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        kind = '♥ ' + list[i].select('.text-white').text() +',' + $('.category-icon').replace(/[ ]/g, ',') + ','+ kind.replace(java.s2t($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(java.t2s($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,|中$/g, ',');
        kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1');
        img = list[i].select('.img-responsive.lazy_img');
        cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + String(list[i].select('a')[0].attr('href')).replace(/(\/.*?\/\d+\/).*/, '$1') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15')).includes(String(list[0]))) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = java.getElements('.btn-toolbar a').attr('href').includes('/') ? java.getElements('.btn-toolbar a') : java.getElements('.read-block.p-b-5.p-t-5 a.0');
    var date = String(java.getElements('.float-right.p-t-5').text()).replace(/.* /, '');
    for (i in list) {
        title = list[i].text();
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ').replace(/\s\d{4}\s\d{2}\s\d{2}$/, '');
        data.push({
            'title': i == list.length - 1 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1),
            'time': java.getElements('.btn-toolbar  a') ? list[i].select('.hidden-xs').text() : String(java.getElements('.float-right.p-t-5').text()).replace(/.* /, '')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/search/photos/' + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1) + '&search_query=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '') + '&main_tag=0&page={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>
